00020 YardDebugScreen::YardDebugScreen(wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id, const wxString& title,
00021     const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size, long style)
00022     :wxFrame(parent, id, title, pos, size, style)
00023 {
00024     wxPanel * panel = new wxPanel(this);
00025     wxFlexGridSizer *item0 = new wxFlexGridSizer( 1, 0, 0 );
00026     item0->AddGrowableCol( 0 );
00027     item0->AddGrowableRow( 0 );
00028     item0->AddGrowableRow( 1 );
00029 
00030     YardLog *item1 = new YardLog( panel, -1, wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(290,160), wxLC_REPORT|wxSUNKEN_BORDER );
00031     item0->Add( item1, 0, wxGROW|wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL|wxALL, 5 );
00032 
00033     wxTextCtrl *item2 = new wxTextCtrl( panel, ID_DEBUG_SQL, wxT(""), wxDefaultPosition, wxSize(80,70), wxTE_MULTILINE|wxTE_READONLY );
00034     item0->Add( item2, 0, wxGROW|wxALIGN_CENTER_VERTICAL|wxALL, 5 );   
00035     panel->SetAutoLayout( TRUE );
00036     panel->SetSizer( item0 );
00037 
00038     item0->SetSizeHints(this);
00039     SetSize(item0->GetMinSize());
00040     
00041 }

00076 void YardDebugScreen::OnDisc(wxCommandEvent & event) {
00077   
00078     try {
00079         wxGetApp().DB().disconnect();
00080     } catch (YardDBException &e)
00081     {
00082         ((wxTextCtrl *)FindWindow(ID_DEBUG_SQL))->SetValue(e.GetSQL().c_str());
00083         wxLogDB(e.GetWhat().c_str());
00084         return;
00085     }        
00086     wxLogDB(wxT("Disconnected"));
00087     
00088 }
